channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: In order to help protect a sandcastle that he and Tala built, Glitch uses a giant vacuum to suck up the sand from the Academy's beach, exposing the illusive ghost crabs to the hungry seagulls up above. To make matters worse, Glitch and his Grimbots lose control of the vacuum, causing chaos in the ocean. Can the Go Jetters protect the crabs while also returning the sand to its proper place.
